ImageWriter - Class in renderer
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriter(String, int, int) - Constructor for class renderer.ImageWriter
Image Writer constructor accepting image name and View Plane parameters,
ImageWriterTest - Class in renderer
Unit tests for renderer.imageWrite class
ImageWriterTest() - Constructor for class renderer.ImageWriterTest
 
INITIAL_K - Static variable in class renderer.BasicRayTracer
initialize the effect on the pixel's color (Coefficient of attenuation), at first its value is 1
intensity - Variable in class elements.Light
the light's intensity
Intersectable - Interface in geometries
Since our model will be based on scanning rays, we would like to define in all geometric shapes an action that will receive a Ray and return points of intersection with the geometry
Intersectable.GeoPoint - Class in geometries
Since we calculate for each point its color regarding to the color of the shape itself, we would like to save each point of intersection along with the shape it cuts, so we built a static internal help class (in the form of PDS - Passive Data Structure)
intersectables - Variable in class geometries.Geometries
List of the shapes
isRunning() - Method in class renderer.ThreadPool
Returns if the thread pool is currently using any threads.
isZero(double) - Static method in class primitives.Util
Checks whether the number is [almost] zero
